video_prompt: Anime character: Softly curious gaze shifting, lips subtly parting, black pigtails swaying slightly. Leather jacket subtly shifts on shoulders, revealing movement-implied shirt. Background lights gently waver, suggesting urban flow.
image_prompt: Anime girl portrait, black pigtails, straight bangs, light brown skin, pink blush, black-rimmed glasses, light brown eyes, curious expression, red lips. Wearing open black leather jacket over white t-shirt with green jumping figure logo and Japanese text. Soft, even lighting, vibrant colors, blurred urban background at dusk/night. Vertical shot, upper chest to above head.
refined_video_prompt: Anime character's gaze softly shifts with curiosity, lips subtly parting. Black pigtails gently sway. The leather jacket subtly moves on shoulders, causing the shirt beneath to ripple. Background lights softly waver, reflecting urban flow.
